name: Telltale Games Archive
summary: Learn about .TTARCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Telltale Games was an American video game developer that published several popular series, including Sam & Max, The Walking Dead, and Game of Thrones: A Telltale Game Series. Many of Telltale's games use game data archives saved in the TTARCH format.
Later Telltale games used archives saved in the .TTARCH2 format. Player-created TTARCH extraction tools can extract assets from both TTARCH and TTARCH2 files.

instructions: You can use Quick and Easy Software Telltale Explorer (Windows) or Telltale TTARCH Files Extractor (Windows) to extract the assets a TTARCH file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Quick and Easy Software Telltale Explorer
